import 'package:flutter/material.dart';

class GWButton extends StatelessWidget {

final width,

height,

child,

backgroundColor,

onPressed,

loading,

border,

borderRadius,

borderColor,

borderWidth,

borderStyle;

const GWButton(

{Key key,

this.width,

this.height,

this.child,

this.backgroundColor,

this.onPressed,

this.loading,

this.border,

this.borderRadius,

this.borderColor,

this.borderWidth,

this.borderStyle})

: super(key: key);

@override

Widget build(BuildContext context) {

return Container(

height: height,

width: width,

child: FlatButton(

child: child,

onPressed: onPressed,

shape: RoundedRectangleBorder(

borderRadius: borderRadius,

side: BorderSide(

color: borderColor,

width: borderWidth,

style: borderStyle,

),

),

),

);

}

}
